# Data Description

Data stored: 
`r data.dir`

Start date:
`r first(power$date_hms)`

End date:
`r last(power$date_hms)`

# Explore the Data

```{r}
power_1=power %>%
  mutate(month=month(date_hms),
         day=day(date_hms),
         hour=hour(date_hms))

ggplot(data = power_1, aes(x=date_hms, y=kwh))+
  geom_line(color = "#00AFBB")

```
